DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim research study enhance smoke cessation outcome among smoker anxiety disorder . We compare two group treatment approach : ( 1 ) An educational-supportive psychotherapy standard smoke cessation treatment , ( 2 ) An integrate smoking cessation anxiety treatment program ( START ) . Both treatment also utilize nicotine replacement therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Smoking Termination / Anxiety Reduction Treatment ( ST/ART )
